file_content.text: If I had a medal, I'd pin it on you.
You're alive--and you got all the torpedo charges! You saved everyone in the whole sector.
With people like you on our side, we'll take back Corellia yet.
I guess you hear that sort of thing all the time, huh? Must be nice, being a Jedi.
I don't know what to say, sir. Soldiers like you are the reason I signed up.
I thought you were crazy to even try, but I guess you're some kind of hero and I just didn't see it.
Thanks to you, we've got a fighting chance in this sector. The Empire's not getting rid of us that easy.
Put out the fires around the torpedoes, then remove the detonite charges and bring them to me. It's the only way we'll be safe.
Unless you're looking to get atomized, you people need to clear out!
Run for it, Master Jedi! If you stay here, you're as good as dead.
Fall back, sir! The whole area's about to be one big crater.
This is no place for civilians! The area could go sky-high any second.
The Empire torched a munitions factory full of starship torpedoes. When the flames hit them, blam! Everything here says goodbye.
My job is to save every life I can. Someone needs to put out that fire.
We can't let that happen.
I sent an emergency alert requesting reinforcements, but the Empire is jamming all signals.
The Republic has troops all over this sector. I'd like to keep them alive.
Including our forces.
That makes two of us--but the fire's too big.
The enemy has forces all over this sector. They'd be killing themselves.
That also hurts the Empire.
I don't think the Empire's planning that far ahead anymore--or maybe they just don't care.
I've got business here, and I hate saying goodbye. Guess I'd better take a personal interest in this.
Including me. Hmm....
If you want to help, I can't stop you--but this is no campfire you can snuff out.
Why aren't you running?
It's too late for me. I can barely breathe, much less run.
Yelling about it won't solve anything. Get a team together and stop the fire.
Go deal with this--now!
My squad went into the munitions plant and tried putting out the fire. We failed. I barely made it out. The others... they're gone.
If we'd just extinguished the flames and removed the torpedoes' charges, they'd be disarmed. I don't guess you'd want to give that a try....
Turning back isn't an option--and I'm not planning to die today.
There's no other choice.
Actually, I do.
But it's practically a suicide mission. You people are either big blasted heroes or crazier than you look. Either way, you're alright by me.
Even Jedi aren't fireproof. You go in there, you might not come out... but I guess you knew that when you volunteered.
Sir, I can't ask you to... aw, who am I kidding? You're the only hope this place has.
I don't know who you are, but it doesn't matter. You pull this off, you'll be a hero.
Use my extinguisher to put out the fires, then remove the torpedo detonite charges and bring them here. Good luck!
Not a chance. [Refuse quest]
Then you'd better run while you can--those torpedoes could go any second! I'll stay here and warn everyone else to evacuate....
The Empire's setting fires everywhere! They've lost their blasted minds!
